00056     class MaintenanceData {
00057     public:
00058       int64_t compactable_memory() {
00059         int64_t total = 0;
00060         for (AccessGroup::MaintenanceData *ag = agdata; ag; ag = ag->next)
00061           total += ag->mem_used;
00062         return total;
00063       }
00064       Range *range;
00065       AccessGroup::MaintenanceData *agdata;
00066       uint64_t bytes_read;
00067       uint64_t bytes_written;
00068       int64_t  purgeable_index_memory;
00069       int64_t  compact_memory;
00070       uint32_t table_id;
00071       int32_t  priority;
00072       int16_t  state;
00073       bool     busy;
00074       bool     needs_split;
00075       bool     needs_compaction;
00076     };

00084     virtual void add(const Key &key, const ByteString value);

00087     virtual int64_t get_total_entries() {
00088       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00089       int64_t total = 0;
00090       for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00091         total += m_access_group_vector[i]->get_total_entries();
00092       return total;
00093     }

00168     bool get_split_info(SplitPredicate &predicate, CommitLogPtr &split_log,
00169                         int64_t *latest_revisionp, bool &wait_for_maintenance) {
00170       bool retval;
00171       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00172 
00173       wait_for_maintenance = false;
00174       *latest_revisionp = m_latest_revision;
00175       if (m_split_log) {
00176         predicate.load(m_split_row, m_split_off_high);
00177         split_log = m_split_log;
00178         retval = true;
00179       }
00180       else {
00181         predicate.clear();
00182         retval = false;
00183       }
00184       if (m_capacity_exceeded_throttle == true)
00185         wait_for_maintenance = true;
00186 
00187       return retval;
00188     }

00206     void drop() {
00207       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00208       for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00209         m_access_group_vector[i]->drop();
00210       m_dropped = true;
00211     }
